creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: three-dimensional goat-like animal on crown--brown with red horns, pink wooly edging and pink topknot; front arched section has three embroidered children with five red pompons; thin tan tassels at front on sides; many elements glued, not sewn
dimension: 5 5/8 x 7 7/16 x 7 1/2 in. (14.29 x 18.89 x 19.05 cm) (without tassels)
title: Child's hat
